title: FL Studio Mobile v2.0.2
description:
FL Studio Mobile allows you to create and save complete multi-track music projects on your Android phone or tablet device. You can even load the FL Studio Mobile projects into the 'FL Studio Desktop PC' version* and take them to the next level.
If itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a beat on the step sequencer, a melody on the piano roll or a full song on the playlist, FL Studio Mobile has you covered. Never lose that idea again. Get it down and happening wherever you are.
FEATURES
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 133 high quality instruments, drum kits & sliced-loop beats
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ All instruments have FL Studio desktop equivalents for FL Studio desktop import and extension
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Step sequencer for fast percussion programming and sliced-loop reworking
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Configurable virtual piano-keyboard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drum pads: Configurable number of pads
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Audio tracks: audio recording (with monitoring), wav/m4a import
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wave editor: cut, trim, normalize, reverse, insert silence, fade in/out (3 curves)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Browser with preview button and logical sorting into Instruments, Synths, Drum kits & Loops
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pan, volume, release and attack time configurable per instrument
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pitch bend via accelerometer
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High quality, battery-friendly audio engine (latency depends on the device)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drum loops and sliced loops ready to start your project with a cool beat
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Effects include Limiter, Reverb, Delay, EQ, Amp & Filter to enhance your mix
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 99 track sequencer and intuitive editing options
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Per-track mute, solo, effect bus, pan and volume adjustment
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit at the level of tracks, bars or down to individual notes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Piano roll editor for manual entry of note & chord sequence data or detailed editing of recorded performances 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Undo and redo for all editable screens
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Metronome with tempo & time-signature settings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Intuitive positioning of screens with the slide gesture and resize with the pinch gesture
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Save and load your songs, export to WAV and AAC
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MIDI file import/export
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share your songs via Email or Dropbox
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In-app user manual
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Android 2.3.3 required
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Works with all screen resolutions, optimized for 1280x800, 800x480, 960x640 and 480x320 screens
